verses.roman:
saba manaḥ-kathā gosāñi kari' nirvāhaṇa
niścinta hañā śīghra āilā vṛndāvana

synonyms: saba—all; manaḥ-kathā—decisions; gosāñi—Rūpa Gosvāmī; kari' nirvāhaṇa—executing properly; niścinta hañā—being freed from all anxiety; śīghra āilā—very soon returned; vṛndāvana—to Vṛndāvana.
translation: Thus after finishing all the tasks he had on his mind, he returned to Vṛndāvana fully satisfied.
